ODIN brings to the space the elegant structure of solid ash, shaped by both CNC cutting and hand workmanship, offering the opportunity for personalization with different color applications as well as wooden and upholstered seating versions where the texture of the wood can be felt. products.name: Design Pod Quad
products.description: Meet QUAD and TRI—two members of the Pod family by Japanese designer Jin Kuramoto. They create a ground for the play of light, offer an impressive Architonic ID: 20325542Year of Launch: 2025Meet QUAD and TRI—two members of the Pod family by Japanese designer Jin Kuramoto.
